descriptionHtml:
Cicero is a handsome, why not?
<br />So I made this mod.
<br />
<br />It include cicero's head and body texture.
<br />
<br />I just used Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles for cicero's body and face to standalone, so you just copy and paste your own data folder.
<br />
<br />and this mod does not include hair retexture and outfit retexture.
<br />[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-KdT9xQbtyiU/Uw7V1x-sB2I/AAAAAAAAA-s/niNdZwF_y2s/w900-h506-no/2.jpg[/img]
<br />[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-AVK7m9M2DxQ/Uw7V1QxWniI/AAAAAAAAA-0/dv3InWxcFiE/w900-h506-no/1.jpg[/img]
<br />
<br />I used the costume for use in this picture. Although not included in my mod.
<br />Crazy Sexy Cicero - Plus Jester Clothes Retexture
<br />[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29446/][/url]
<br />I used the hair retexture for use in this picture. Although not included in my mod.
<br />Superior Lore-Friendly Hair - HD textures
<br />[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/][/url]
